jobs.title: Reinforcement Learning Training Expert
jobs.skillset: Deep Learning, AI Model Training, Computer Vision, Neural Network, Deep Neural Network, Python, Reinforcement Learning, Deep Learning
jobs.job_description: I am looking for an expert in reinforcement learning (RL) training for large language models (LLMs) who can analyze, replicate, and implement aspects of the DeepSeek-V3-R1 training methodology. While DeepSeek has not released training code, I aim to integrate some of their training logic into my existing framework for experimentation. Key Responsibilities: • Implement reinforcement learning training strategies inspired by DeepSeek-V3-R1. • Modify and extend my existing training code to integrate new logic. • Optimize the training process for scalability and efficiency. • Collaborate with me to brainstorm, test, and refine experimental components. Required Skills & Expertise: • Expert-level proficiency in Python and deep learning frameworks (PyTorch preferred). • Strong experience with LLM and Vision-Language Model (VLM) training. • Deep understanding of reinforcement learning techniques for LLMs. • Familiarity with distributed training and scaling experiments. • Ability to write clean, modular, and well-documented code. Preferred Qualifications: • Prior experience with RLHF (Reinforcement Learning with Human Feedback) or RL-based fine-tuning of LLMs. • Understanding of DeepSeek-V3-R1’s training innovations. • Experience working with multi-GPU training. Project Scope: • The base training code is already available. • Your main task is to implement specific experimental modifications. • You will receive clear guidance on the required changes.

jobs.title: Reinforcement learning
jobs.skillset: Artificial Neural Network, TensorFlow, Deep Learning, Machine Learning, Python, Neural Network, Reinforcement Learning, Deep Neural Network, Keras
jobs.job_description:
I want to create a realistic environment for an RL-based commuting experiment in Riyadh city. The goal is to build a simulation where an agent can make optimal decisions about driving, parking, and taking the metro to minimize travel time, cost, and environmental impact.

Project Scope:

1. Data Acquisition:
• Obtain accurate geospatial data for Riyadh’s road network and metro system using OpenStreetMap or other reliable sources.

2. Environment Development:
• Use tools like SUMO (Simulation of Urban Mobility) or MATSim to create a realistic simulation of Riyadh’s traffic and metro system.
• Integrate road traffic, metro lines, stations, and parking zones into the simulation.

3. Reinforcement Learning Integration:
• Build a custom OpenAI Gym-compatible environment where an RL agent can interact with the simulation.
• Define states, actions, and rewards for the agent:
• States: Current location, time of day, mode of transportation, distance to nearest metro station, parking availability.
• Actions: Drive, park, take the metro, continue driving.
• Rewards: Minimize total travel time, cost, and environmental impact.

4. Testing and Evaluation:
• The freelancer will help set up a framework for training and evaluating the RL agent’s performance under different traffic conditions.
